Structs/UIControlPublisher.html.name: UIControlPublisher
Structs/UIControlPublisher.html.abstract: A custom Publisher to work with our custom UIControlSubscription.

Protocols/CombineCompatible.html.name: CombineCompatible
Protocols/CombineCompatible.html.abstract: Extending the UIControl types to be able to produce a UIControl.Event publisher.

Extensions/UIFont.html#/s:So6UIFontC13PB.name: preferredMonospacedFont(for:weight:maxPointSize:)
Extensions/UIFont.html#/s:So6UIFontC13PB.abstract: Returns an instance of the monospaced digit system font associated with the text style, specified wieght, and scaled appropriately for the user’s selected content size category.

Extensions/UIFont.html#/s:So6UIFontC13PB.name: preferredFont(forTextStyle:weight:fontDesign:)
Extensions/UIFont.html#/s:So6UIFontC13PB.abstract: Returns an instance of the font associated with the text style, specified design, and scaled appropriately for the user’s selected content size category.

Enums/PBMediaSliderStyle.html#/c:@M@PBMe.name: slider
Enums/PBMediaSliderStyle.html#/c:@M@PBMe.abstract: A control for selecting a single value from a continuous range of values.

Enums/PBMediaSliderStyle.html#/c:@M@PBMe.name: progress
Enums/PBMediaSliderStyle.html#/c:@M@PBMe.abstract: A control for selecting a single value from a continuous range of values, that depicts the progress of a task over time..

Enums/PBMediaSliderStyle.html#/s:13PBMed.name: strings
Enums/PBMediaSliderStyle.html#/s:13PBMed.abstract: An array of human readable strings for the slider view styles.

Enums/PBMediaSliderStyle.html#/s:13PBMed.name: description
Enums/PBMediaSliderStyle.html#/s:13PBMed.abstract: Return an human readable description for the slider view style.

Classes/PBMediaSlider.html#/c:@M@PBMedia.name: style
Classes/PBMediaSlider.html#/c:@M@PBMedia.abstract: The slider view style. Default is slider.

Classes/PBMediaSlider.html#/c:@M@PBMedia.name: wideningFactor
Classes/PBMediaSlider.html#/c:@M@PBMedia.abstract: The widening factor of the control when tracking. If you change the value of this property and it is less than 1.0, it is adjusted to 1.0 (no widening).

Classes/PBMediaSlider.html#/c:@M@PBMedia.name: isContinuous
Classes/PBMediaSlider.html#/c:@M@PBMedia.abstract: A Boolean value indicating whether changes in the slider’s value generate continuous update events.

Classes/PBMediaSlider.html#/c:@M@PBMedia.name: isEnabled
Classes/PBMediaSlider.html#/c:@M@PBMedia.abstract: A Boolean value indicating whether the control is in the enabled state.

Classes/PBMediaSlider.html#/c:@M@PBMedia.name: effect
Classes/PBMediaSlider.html#/c:@M@PBMedia.abstract: The visual effect applied to the PBMediaSlider elements.

Classes/PBMediaSlider.html#/c:@M@PBMedia.name: emptyColor
Classes/PBMediaSlider.html#/c:@M@PBMedia.abstract: The default color for the part of the slider that is not filled.

Classes/PBMediaSlider.html#/c:@M@PBMedia.name: fillColor
Classes/PBMediaSlider.html#/c:@M@PBMedia.abstract: The default color for the part of the slider that is filled.

Classes/PBMediaSlider.html#/c:@M@PBMedia.name: activeFillColor
Classes/PBMediaSlider.html#/c:@M@PBMedia.abstract: The default color for the part of the slider that is filled when tracking.

Classes/PBMediaSlider.html#/c:@M@PBMedia.name: minimumValueImage
Classes/PBMediaSlider.html#/c:@M@PBMedia.abstract: The image that represents the slider’s minimum value.

Classes/PBMediaSlider.html#/c:@M@PBMedia.name: maximumValueImage
Classes/PBMediaSlider.html#/c:@M@PBMedia.abstract: The image that represents the slider’s maximum value.

Classes/PBMediaSlider.html#/c:@M@PBMedia.name: elapsedTimeLabel
Classes/PBMediaSlider.html#/c:@M@PBMedia.abstract: The elapsed time label of the progress control (read-only, but its properties can be changed).

Classes/PBMediaSlider.html#/c:@M@PBMedia.name: remainingTimeLabel
Classes/PBMediaSlider.html#/c:@M@PBMedia.abstract: The remaining time label of the progress control (read-only, but its properties can be changed).

Classes/PBMediaSlider.html#/c:@M@PBMedia.name: allowHapticFeedbackGeneration
Classes/PBMediaSlider.html#/c:@M@PBMedia.abstract: Controls whether interaction with the popup generates haptic feedback to the user.

Classes/PBMediaSlider.html#/s:13PBMediaS.name: feedbackStyle
Classes/PBMediaSlider.html#/s:13PBMediaS.abstract: The UIImpactFeedbackGenerator.FeedbackStyle used for haptic feedback when the slider reaches either end of its track.

Classes/UIControlSubscription.html.name: UIControlSubscription
Classes/UIControlSubscription.html.abstract: A custom subscription to capture UIControl target events.

Classes/PBMediaSlider.html.name: PBMediaSlider
Classes/PBMediaSlider.html.abstract: PBMediaSlider is a small Swift Package aiming to recreate volume and track sliders found in Apple Music on iOS 16 and later.
